member.name: IMFSinkWriterEncoderConfig.PlaceEncodingParameters
member.summary: Dynamically updates the encoder configuration with a collection of new encoder settings.
member.param: A set of encoding parameters to configure the encoder with.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFSinkWriterEncoderConfig.SetTargetMediaType
member.summary: Dynamically changes the target media type that Sink Writer is encoding to.
member.param: The new media format to encode to.
The new set of encoding parameters to configure the encoder with. If not specified, previously provided parameters will be used.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFSinkWriterEncoderConfig
member.summary: Provides additional functionality on the sink writer for dynamically changing the media type and encoder configuration.
